reviewText: I was not expecting the long introduction from Charleston Heston.  This loses the childrens attention and it takes a minute to get it back.
These do not stick close enough to scripture for me to feel comfortable allowing children to learn from.  Too much is added.
A cartoon cd for under 5 years old.  I would not recommend this product for any anyone over the age of 5.

Must have to teach your children about life and that God is in control of this life. America must get back to God, these DVD's will help your child to grow in the Lord, the stories bring me back to my parents teaching and bible school classes. Children need to know that life decisions rather right or wrong affects each and every one of us.
My granddaughter loves this dvd. It's a great learning experience for her.
Good learning tool for kids. My grandchildren had a great time watching animated Bible stories.
I got this DVD's for children church they said this is just what they needed so l made me happy

they are ok.. I ommit Charles Heston talk....He makes statements that are far off.  I used the dvd and at times must stop to explain the kids some parts... I m not sure I would recommend, unless you know your stuff and can sit with the children and explain and avoid the Charles 's talk
the children seemed to like it
Yes.  I would recommend this movie for children 9-10 or older.  I think the narrative was very informative and good.
